items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect date night dress
items.body: Was soooo flattering, wore this for my anniversary! Got a size XS, I'm 5'2 and around 110 lbs! Fit so perfect, wasn't too long or short either! Fell a bit below my ankles, but could be pulled up if desired! Looks just like the picture, I wore it off the shoulder tho! Feels super soft and light on the skin, did ride up slightly since it was skintight, but this is pretty expected as I was running and dancing lol! Sat nicely against my skin, and wasn't see through at all! Can dress it up with some heels and pearls, or dress down with a sweater over top! Read more
items.author: Teagan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous and flattering
items.body: This dress is so flattering! I got so many compliments and it’s comfortable too. Quality is great for the price! It’s breathable and soft to the touch. It also has great stretch to it so it can form well to your body. Sizing was perfect and just right. Read more
items.author: Kimberly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect little black dress! Classy in the front, sexy in the back!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I’m 5’7”, 145 lbs, and typically wear a 34DDD. I ordered a size Medium and it fit perfectly. The material is very soft, stretchy, and comfortable, with a nice snug fit. I saw some reviews mentioning that the fabric was see-through, but I did not experience that issue at all. I did not wear a bra, and the dress was opaque for me. The fit is secure enough that adhesive covers (such as Cakes or Nippies) stay in place without any problems. If someone does find it to be slightly sheer, I would recommend sizing up. I wore this dress to a Christmas party and loved it—so much so that I plan to order it in additional colors. Read more
items.author: Sara B. Montgomery

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Skims dupe!
items.body: Soooo comfy,almost perfect but it’s a little short for a tall girly Read more
items.author: Hannah Grauman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommend!
items.body: Put it in the cart!! This dress is SO soft, comfortable, and flattering. The material and thick and has a lot of stretch to it. Not see through at all. I’m 5’6”, 149lbs, and got a medium, which was a perfect fit. I got so many compliments and it is very sexy without being too over the top. If you’ve got a back that you want to show off, this is the dress to do it with! Read more
items.author: Mark Johnson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid choice
items.body: I'm typically a small but went with a medium and it fits perfect. Fitted but stretchy. I'm 5'6 130 lbs. material is very soft and pretty thick for the price. Length hits right where it should Read more
items.author: chris diacopoulos

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: Fits perfectly and looks beautiful on it, great quality Read more
items.author: Lilian

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5 stars!
items.body: This dress fit like a glove. I got so many compliments! It was a nice stretchy material. I got a size small. I’m 5’3 125lbs 34 DD. I taped my tatas and it looked great. It was very comfortable and flattering. Read more
items.author: Camryn

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve Bodycon Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve Bodycon Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy, Pink, White, Light Heather Grey, Dark Grey, Black, Cocoa. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
